description: This file defines the HotelBookingEntity class, representing hotel booking details as a JPA entity for persistence in a relational database. It includes fields like bookingId, guestsCount, roomType, createdAt, and updatedAt, with corresponding getter and setter methods, and is annotated for ORM mapping.

classes.name: HotelBookingEntity
classes.description: Entity class representing hotel booking information with ORM mappings and getter/setter methods.

methods.name: getBookingId
methods.description: Returns the unique identifier for the hotel booking.

methods.name: setBookingId
methods.description: Sets the unique identifier for the hotel booking.

methods.name: getGuestsCount
methods.description: Returns the number of guests for the booking.

methods.name: setGuestsCount
methods.description: Sets the number of guests for the booking.

methods.name: getRoomType
methods.description: Returns the type of room booked.

methods.name: setRoomType
methods.description: Sets the type of room booked.

methods.name: getCreatedAt
methods.description: Returns the timestamp when the booking was created.

methods.name: setCreatedAt
methods.description: Sets the creation timestamp of the booking.

methods.name: getUpdatedAt
methods.description: Returns the timestamp when the booking was last updated.

methods.name: setUpdatedAt
methods.description: Sets the last update timestamp of the booking.
